Are you good with your hands and can work power tools?

Are you good with your hands and can work power tools?  â€“ Then we have steady work (Monday to Friday) for you for 2-3 years. We are looking for 4-5 demolition workers who want to be part of our fantastic team of 40 employees in Copenhagen and the surrounding areas. You speak Danish or English and can operate tools such as a reciprocating saw, concrete hammer, etc.
